game.title: Aurora Rising
game.synopsis: In a world where ancient magic has awakened, the land is scarred and divided. Players take on the role of an amnesiac protagonist who possesses a rare gift – the ability to wield both magic and technology. As they embark on a journey to uncover their past and unite the warring factions, they must confront a powerful enemy known only as "The Devourer" that threatens to consume everything.
game.beginning: The game begins in the ruins of an ancient city, where the protagonist awakens with no memory of who they are or how they got there. They soon discover their unique abilities and meet a group of allies who join them on their quest.
game.ending: After navigating treacherous landscapes and battling formidable foes, the protagonist finally uncovers the truth about their past and the source of The Devourer's power. With this knowledge, they must make a choice: to save the world from destruction or succumb to the darkness within themselves. Depending on the player's actions throughout the game, the ending will unfold in one of three ways – redemption, despair, or rebirth.
